name: Sateenkaarisoturin pieni seikkailu
description:
The Sateenkaariolento (rainbow creature) has left its Sateenkaarikikkares (rainpoos) all over universe and your mission is to collect them. You are the adorable pink creature called Sateenkaarisoturi! 

You get points from collecting stuff and loose points if you loose health or die.

Mouse - click start to begin the game and exit to get back into start menu

A - move left

D - move right

W - jump

space bar - drop bomb
